description:
Manages a ServiceBus Topic.

**Note** Topics can only be created in Namespaces with an SKU of `standard` or higher.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AutoDeleteOnIdle.description:
The ISO 8601 timespan duration of the idle interval after which the
Topic is automatically deleted, minimum of 5 minutes.

DefaultMessageTtl.description:
The ISO 8601 timespan duration of TTL of messages sent to this topic if no
TTL value is set on the message itself.

DuplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow.description:
The ISO 8601 timespan duration during which
duplicates can be detected. Defaults to 10 minutes. (`PT10M`).

EnableBatchedOperations.description:
Boolean flag which controls if server-side
batched operations are enabled. Defaults to false.

EnableExpress.description:
Boolean flag which controls whether Express Entities
are enabled. An express topic holds a message in memory temporarily before writing
it to persistent storage. Defaults to false.

EnablePartitioning.description:
Boolean flag which controls whether to enable
the topic to be partitioned across multiple message brokers. Defaults to false.
Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

MaxSizeInMegabytes.description:
Integer value which controls the size of
memory allocated for the topic. For supported values see the "Queue/topic size"
section of [this document](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/service-bus-messaging/service-bus-quotas).

Name.description:
Specifies the name of the ServiceBus Topic resource. Changing this forces a
new resource to be created.

NamespaceName.description:
The name of the ServiceBus Namespace to create
this topic in. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

RequiresDuplicateDetection.description:
Boolean flag which controls whether
the Topic requires duplicate detection. Defaults to false. Changing this forces
a new resource to be created.

ResourceGroupName.description:
The name of the resource group in which to
create the namespace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Status.description: The Status of the Service Bus Topic. Acceptable values are `Active` or `Disabled`. Defaults to `Active`.

SupportOrdering.description:
Boolean flag which controls whether the Topic
supports ordering. Defaults to false.
